Ressources

Vous pouvez télécharger le .bib contenant toutes les références citées pendant la formation en cliquant sur le bouton ci-dessous.

.bib file of all references

Livre conseillé: Statistical Rethinking

Richard McElreath, Statistical Rethinking: A Bayesian Course with Examples in R and Stan (McElreath, 2020)

Official links:

  • Book page
  • R package
  • 2022 lecture videos
  • 2022 lecture slides and homework and answers

Translations:

  • A. Solomon Kurz, Statistical Rethinking with brms, ggplot2, and the tidyverse: Second edition (Kurz, 2021)
  • Vincent Arel-Bundock, Statistical Rethinking 2 with Stan and R, (Arel-Bundock, 2020)

Autres livres

We don’t have time to cover these this semester, but these are all really great and useful resources!

  • John K. Kruschke, Doing Bayesian Data Analysis: A Tutorial with R, JAGS, and Stan (Kruschke, 2015)

    • Website
    • A. Solomon Kurz, Doing Bayesian Data Analysis in brms and the tidyverse, translation to brms (Kurz, 2022)

  • Ben Lambert, A Student’s Guide to Bayesian Statistics (Lambert, 2018)

  • Andrew Gelman, John Carlin, Hal Stern, David Dunson, Aki Vehtari, and Donald Rubin, Bayesian Data Analysis (Gelman et al., 2013)

  • Allen B. Downey, Think Bayes 2 (Downey, 2021)

References

Arel-Bundock, V. (2020). Statistical rethinking 2 with Stan and R. https://vincentarelbundock.github.io/rethinking2/
Downey, A. B. (2021). Think bayes (2nd ed.). Green Tea Press. https://allendowney.github.io/ThinkBayes2/
Gelman, A., Carlin, J., Stern, H., Dunson, D., Vehtari, A., & Rubin, D. (2013). Bayesian data analysis (3rd ed.). Chapman and Hall / CRC.
Kruschke, J. K. (2015). Doing bayesian data analysis: A tutorial with R, JAGS, and Stan (2nd ed.). Academic Press / Elsevier. https://doi.org/10.1016/c2012-0-00477-2
Kurz, A. S. (2021). Statistical rethinking with brms, ggplot2, and the tidyverse (2nd ed.). https://bookdown.org/content/4857/
Kurz, A. S. (2022). Doing bayesian data analysis in brms and the tidyverse. https://bookdown.org/content/3686/
Lambert, B. (2018). A student’s guide to bayesian statistics. Sage. https://ben-lambert.com/a-students-guide-to-bayesian-statistics/
McElreath, R. (2020). Statistical rethinking: A bayesian course with examples in R and stan (2nd ed.). Chapman and Hall / CRC. https://xcelab.net/rm/statistical-rethinking/
